title: Focus on Marijuana
creator_credit: Noel Nosseck, Directions Unlimited, Avanti Films and American Educational Films
brief_description: This film is a dramatised story about peer pressure amidst young people of varying socio-economic levels to smoke marijuana. Encourages potential “pot” users to think for themselves before making a decision which could affect the rest of their lives. Written by Max Miller.
creator_credit_for_label: Noel Nosseck, Directions Unlimited, Avanti Films and American Educational Films
